explains: adj. 中产阶级的；（态度、观念等）中产阶级特有的，古板的

sentences.en: It was middle-class votes they were pitching for.
sentences.cn: 他们试图争取的是中产阶级的选票。

sentences.en: His informants were middle-class professional women.
sentences.cn: 他的合作者是中产阶级职业妇女。

sentences.en: Politics is still dominated by the middle-class mafia.
sentences.cn: 政治仍然操纵在中产阶级帮派手中。
